name: Green Valley (itch)
description:
A small game created in the span of 20 days where you control seb who's goal is to take the medicine than the valley doctor has created but the valley doctor will ask him to beat him in his game first. Collect coins and go to him and play the last game to win.

Controls:
arrow keys to or "WASD" keys move left or right.
"Z" to jump.
"E" to talk.
Wall jumps and wall slide.

Tools used:
Unity engine for programming the game.
Aseprite for sprites.
Bosca Ceoil for music

Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/1Luffy
